author: angirar
body:
Backport of PR [#23363](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23363) to 94X release which modifies tracking in FastSim for the phase1 upgraded pixel tracker.
All the changes are consistent in the older release except for one extra commit [7fc2cc2](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24624/commits/7fc2cc259f657211e1e7dcb20eb16ddd84cd4e68). It was necessary because some tracking features (related to mostly "SeedingLayerSetsBuilder" class) were available only from 10X onwards. And so this commit is a way around those missing features, serving the same functionality overall.
title: Backport of Phase1 Tracking in FastSim to 94X
